root.name: Two Brothers
root.description: OverviewA screenshot showing the game's Game Boy inspired aesthetic.AckkStudios was asking for $6,000 on Kickstarter to make Two Brothers, an action RPG with a visual style lifted from the monochromatic look of the original Game Boy. They exceeded their funding goal and received a total of $16,257 in donations.The core design team of Two Brothers consists of: Brian Allanson (the games Director//Lead Programmer/Sprite Artist), Tyler Steele (level designer/programmer), Ian Bailey (side quest designer/programmer), Andrew Allanson (lead composer), Jose Alfaro (Sequencer/Additional tracks/sound effects).The game will be available for PC, Mac, Linux, Wii U eShop, and PlayStation Network starting November 11, 2013.

similar_games.game: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
